keyMoments.title: The G-5 Marines' Ultimate Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Several G-5 Marines sacrifice themselves to save their captain Tashigi, staying behind to be petrified by Shinokuni while ensuring she escapes through the closing gate.
keyMoments.significance: This moment completely transforms the perception of the G-5 Marines from rough, morally questionable individuals to heroes demonstrating the ultimate loyalty and selflessness. It becomes one of the most memorable moments of the Punk Hazard arc.

description: The G-5 Marine branch is known for being staffed by rough, violent marines who are considered the most brutal unit in the Marines. Despite their questionable methods and criminal pasts, they demonstrate unwavering loyalty to their commanders, particularly Captain Tashigi and Vice Admiral Smoker.
